testcase.name: Login attempts - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the login page.........................................passed When the user enters username "admin" and password "admin123"...............passed And clicks the login button.................................................passed Then the user should be redirected to the homepage "http://localhost:8081/insurance-mysql-crud/dashboard".passed

testcase.name: Login attempts - Example #1.2
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the login page.........................................passed When the user enters username "wrong" and password "wrong123"...............passed And clicks the login button.................................................passed Then an error message "Invalid credentials" should be displayed.............passed
